programs.program:
as principal admin password "admin" do
set x = "hello"
set delegation x admin read -> anyone
return x
***

as principal admin password "admin" do
create principal bob "b"
create principal alice "b"
return x
***

as principal admin password "admin" do
set x = "hello"
delete delegation x admin read -> anyone
return x
***

as principal bob password "b" do
return x
***
